mapper.select: select a.* from ( select b.*, rownum rn from (select distinct bo.board_no , bo.board_title , bo.category_big , trunc(d.download_date) download_date , bo.member_id sal_id from board bo inner join file_download d on bo.board_no = d.group_no where d.member_id = #{member_id} order by bo.board_no desc) b) a where rn between #{first} and #{last}

select a.* from ( select c.*, rownum rn from ( select b.board_no ,b.board_title ,b.category_big ,round(sum(f.file_storage),2) file_storage ,f.upload_date from board b join file_upload f on b.board_no = f.group_no inner join members m on m.member_id=b.member_id where m.member_id = #{member_id} group by b.board_no , b.board_title , b.category_big , f.upload_date order by b.board_no desc ) c) a where rn between #{first} and #{last}

select count(*) from acorn where member_id = #{member_id}
and acorn_content like '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'

select a.* from ( select b.*, rownum rn from ( select reg_no , bank , account_no , account_own , reg_recash , reg_date , case when recash_date is null then 'N' else 'Y' end as state from recash where member_id=#{member_id} order by 1 desc ) b) a where rn between #{first} and #{last}
mapper.insert: insert into recash(reg_no, member_id, bank, account_no, account_own, reg_recash, reg_date) values (#{reg_no}, #{member_id}, #{bank}, #{account_no}, #{account_own}, #{reg_recash}, sysdate)
